name: Cisco | IOSXR | Network | OAM | Discovery Timeout (SYSLOG)
description: %L2-ELO-6-INTF_DISCOVERY_TIMEOUT : TenGigE0/0/1/0: OAM discovery failed to complete in the specified time

patterns.value_re: %L2-ELO-6-INTF_DISCOVERY_TIMEOUT : (?P<interface>\S+): OAM discovery failed to complete in the specified time
